library(tidyverse)

header <- c( "chr", "start", "end", "count" )
dfA <- read_tsv("~/qb25-answers/week1/hg19-kc-count.bed", col_names=header)
dfB <- read_tsv("~/qb25-answers/week1/hg16-kc-count.bed", col_names=header)

df_comb <- bind_rows (hg19=dfA, hg16=dfB, .id="assembly" )
df_comb %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = start, y= count, color = assembly)) +
    geom_line() +
    facet_wrap(~chr, scales = "free") +
    labs(
      x = "Location (start)",
      y = "Frequency (count)",
      title = "hg19 and hg16"
  ) 


ggsave("exercise2.png", width = 20, height = 12)
